SCSI.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: something that helps a small computer work with another piece of electronic equipment, such as a printer, especially when they are connected by wires
SCSI.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: Small Computer Systems Interface; a part of a computer where you can connect another piece of equipment such as a printer
SCSI.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The PC has an integrated SCSI adaptor.
